Summary: saw 3 glowing orb like structures very low to ground that pulsated light then disappeared
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There was one other sighting in Pittsburgh on or around June 10th 2012
divs: sighting details3 fire like orbs appeared over the neighborhood, all were hovering and flashing\pulsating different colors of light, no sound was noted. they all gravitated toward each other and abruptly disappeared.
